Source code for Model

[docs]class Model:
    worker_list = []
    logging = False

    @staticmethod

[docs]    def get_worker():
        return Model.worker_list


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def get_last_id():
        if len(Model.worker_list) == 0:
            return 0
        else:
            return Model.worker_list[-1].get_id()


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def add_worker(w):
        Model.worker_list.append(w)


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def delete_worker(w):
        Model.worker_list.remove(w)


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def enable_logging():
        Model.logging = True


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def disable_logging():
        Model.logging = False


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def is_logging():
        return Model.logging
